snippet: A death row inmate, Gary Haugen, has the right to reject Gov. John Kitzhaber’s decision not to execute him.
abstract: Oregon judge rules that death row inmate Gary Haugen has the right to reject Gov John Kitzhaber’s decision not to execute him.
lead_paragraph: A death row inmate, Gary Haugen, has the right to reject Gov. John Kitzhaber’s decision not to execute him.

headline.main: Oregon: Judge Allows Condemned Man to Reject Reprieve From Governor
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Judge Allows Condemned Man To Reject Reprieve From Governor
